paper_abstract: We consider the on-line preemptive scheduling of weighted equal-length intervals on multiple machines to maximize the total weight of completed intervals. We design an algorithm that is 2-competitive when the number of machines m is even; and (2 + 2/2m-1)-competitive when m is an odd number at least 3. For example, when m = 3, it is 2.4-competitive. As m increases, the competitive ratio approaches 2. (C) 2012 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On-line scheduling of equal-length intervals on parallel machines
